summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BALANCE Italian B2B SaaS app. Fixed critical backend ObjectId serialization bug. All core features working: auth flow, onboarding, dashboard calculations, costs/income management, inventory with status calculation, AI insights generation. UI fully in Italian with dark mode.
passed_tests: Dashboard with daily profit calculations and status
Fixed costs with monthly amount and daily quota calculation
Material inventory with automatic status calculation (OK, Attenzione, Ordina ora)
AI insights generation using GPT-5.2 (Free plan: 1 generic insight)
Complete CRUD operations for all entities
